thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-ManTech Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.73

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ManTech Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.73
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - ManTech International Corp:
* MANTECH ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.45 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.73 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 17 PERCENT TO $462.3 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $1.88 BILLION - $1.95 BILLION
* SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE IN RANGE OF $1.96 - $2.05
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.81, REVENUE VIEW $1.91 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.39, REVENUE VIEW $461.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
